__comment1: This is an example configuration file for Lambda Running
__comment2: You can copy this file to your project root and customize it
__layersComment: Simple layer definition - just specify the layer names
__layerMappingsComment: Detailed layer mappings for more complex scenarios
__envFilesComment: Environment files to load (.env is loaded by default)
__ignorePatternsComment: Additional patterns to ignore when scanning for handlers
__ignoreLayerFilesOnScanComment: Whether to ignore files in the layers directory when scanning for handlers
__debugComment: Enable debug mode for verbose logging
